children.subject: Last time it was taught, nothing from the textbook was _required_.

history.content:
The required textbook on the calcentral booklist for 168 specifies that it comes with an access code (presumably for problem sets). Is it necessary that we buy that textbook? The version with an access code is only available from the student store and is significantly more expensive than an amazon version without an access code. 

I know from the emails that Professor Shenker sent that the projects will be revamped, but do we need an access code?
